body_html:
That is actually already fixed. All the failures you see now are related to this PR:

In file included from tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/ring.cu.cc:6:0:
./tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/ring.h:17:33: fatal error: third_party/mpi/mpi.h: No such file or directory
 #include "third_party/mpi/mpi.h"

Some BUILD dependencies are missing.

body:
That is actually already fixed. All the failures you see now are related to this PR:
```
In file included from tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/ring.cu.cc:6:0:
./tensorflow/contrib/mpi_collectives/ring.h:17:33: fatal error: third_party/mpi/mpi.h: No such file or directory
 #include "third_party/mpi/mpi.h"
```

Some BUILD dependencies are missing.
